vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.42a;
son of: Caleb (H3612H);
brother of: Hur (H2354), Jesher (H3475), Shobab (H7727H), Ardon (H0715), Haran (H2771B), Moza (H4162), Gazez (H1495), Jahdai (H3056), Sheber (H7669), Tirhanah (H8647), Shaaph (H8174H), Sheva (H7724) and Achsah (H5915H);
father of: Ziph (H2128I) and Hebron (H2275I)
§ Mesha = "deliverance"
the eldest son of Caleb by his wife Azubah and grandson of Hezron
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Caleb; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
米沙 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "拯救"
迦勒和阿蘇巴的長子, 希斯崙的孫子 (代上2:42)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
米沙 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "拯救"
迦勒和阿苏巴的长子, 希斯仑的孙子 (代上2:42)
